description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter screen named SearchScreen, which provides a user interface for searching books or authors. It includes a text input field and displays a message based on the current input.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that represents the search screen UI.

classes.name: _SearchScreenState
classes.description: The state associated with SearchScreen, managing the TextEditingController and UI rendering.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the search screen, including the app bar, input field, and results message.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the TextEditingController when the widget is removed from the widget tree.
